org.infinispan.interceptors

Packages that use org.infinispan.interceptors
Package
Description
org.infinispan
This is the core of Infinispan, a distributed, transactional, highly scalable data grid platform.

org.infinispan.configuration.cache
Cache configuration
org.infinispan.extendedstats.topK
 
org.infinispan.extendedstats.wrappers
 
org.infinispan.factories
Factories are internal components used to create other components based on a cache's configuration.
org.infinispan.interceptors
Infinispan is designed around a set of interceptors around a data container.

  • Classes in org.infinispan.interceptors used by org.infinispan.extendedstats.topK
    Class
    Description
    AsyncInterceptor
    Interface for sequential interceptors.
    BaseAsyncInterceptor
    Base class for an interceptor in the new asynchronous invocation chain.
    BaseCustomAsyncInterceptor
    Anyone using the AsyncInterceptorChain.addInterceptor(AsyncInterceptor, int) method (or any of its overloaded forms) or registering custom interceptors via XML should extend this base class when creating their own custom interceptors.
    DDAsyncInterceptor
    Interface for async interceptors using double-dispatch.

  • Classes in org.infinispan.interceptors used by org.infinispan.interceptors
    Class
    Description
    AsyncInterceptor
    Interface for sequential interceptors.
    AsyncInterceptorChain
    Interceptor chain using AsyncInterceptors.
    BaseAsyncInterceptor
    Base class for an interceptor in the new asynchronous invocation chain.
    DDAsyncInterceptor
    Interface for async interceptors using double-dispatch.
    EmptyAsyncInterceptorChain
     
    InvocationCallback
    Base interface for all callbacks used by BaseAsyncInterceptor and InvocationStage methods.
    InvocationExceptionFunction
    Callback interface for BaseAsyncInterceptor.invokeNextAndExceptionally(InvocationContext, VisitableCommand, InvocationExceptionFunction).
    InvocationFinallyAction
    Callback interface for BaseAsyncInterceptor.invokeNextAndFinally(InvocationContext, VisitableCommand, InvocationFinallyAction).
    InvocationFinallyFunction
    Callback interface for BaseAsyncInterceptor.invokeNextAndHandle(InvocationContext, VisitableCommand, InvocationFinallyFunction).
    InvocationStage
    A partial command invocation, either completed or in progress.
    InvocationSuccessAction
    Callback interface for BaseAsyncInterceptor.invokeNextThenAccept(InvocationContext, VisitableCommand, InvocationSuccessAction).
    InvocationSuccessFunction
    Callback interface for BaseAsyncInterceptor.invokeNextThenApply(InvocationContext, VisitableCommand, InvocationSuccessFunction).
